about_the_game:
Master the Bushido code with three different Japanese Navy ships, each representing a unique gameplay style. On top of that, a full day of Warships Premium Account to start you off on the right foot. Battleship Kawachi, cruiser Tenryu, and destroyer Wakatake each come with their own Commander with 3 skill points.

This bundle includes:

  • Tier III researchable* Destroyer Wakatake with a 3-skill point Commander
  • Tier III researchable* Cruiser Tenryū with a 3-skill point Commander
  • Tier III researchable* Battleship Kawachi with a 3-skill point Commander
  • 1 day of Warships Premium Account

If you already own one or more of these ships, you will not receive any compensation for them.

*These ships are researchable — meaning that they can be earned in-game through playing. This bundle offers to speed up your low Tier research by giving you immediate access to this nation's different ship types.

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be invoiced on your Wargaming Account only once.
detailed_description:
Master the Bushido code with three different Japanese Navy ships, each representing a unique gameplay style. On top of that, a full day of Warships Premium Account to start you off on the right foot. Battleship Kawachi, cruiser Tenryu, and destroyer Wakatake each come with their own Commander with 3 skill points.

This bundle includes:

  • Tier III researchable* Destroyer Wakatake with a 3-skill point Commander
  • Tier III researchable* Cruiser Tenryū with a 3-skill point Commander
  • Tier III researchable* Battleship Kawachi with a 3-skill point Commander
  • 1 day of Warships Premium Account

If you already own one or more of these ships, you will not receive any compensation for them.

*These ships are researchable — meaning that they can be earned in-game through playing. This bundle offers to speed up your low Tier research by giving you immediate access to this nation's different ship types.

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be invoiced on your Wargaming Account only once.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz, Core i3 2.5 GHz, AMD Athlon II X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 440/630, AMD Radeon HD 7660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 62 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz, AMD FX 6350 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 65 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11.1
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080

esrb.descriptors:
Violence
• Mostly realistic setting
• Photo-realistic depiction

Violence Against Non-Humans
• Violence is often depicted from a distance
• Violence is rarely depicted close-up
• No blood and gore

Language
• Minor profanities (e.g. "damn"; "hell")
